short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes everything but the video from buffstream streams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that deletes all scripts and elements on buffstreams except for the video itself. Extension also makes the video take up the entire screen space.
